headline: Riding the AI wave? You need a 'strong stomach': Dan Ives' strategy
summary: In the AI trade, you "can't just bet on one company," Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research, Dan Ives, tells Yahoo Finance, highlighting the importance of diversification for AI investors. Watch the video above to hear more about Ives' AI thesis and the 30 stocks in the Dan IVES Wedbush AI Revolution ETF (IVES). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Fears grow of AI bubble - and here are the pressure points that could burst it
summary: While the value of some companies integral to the AI boom like Nvidia, Oracle and Coreweave have seen their value fall since the highs of the mid-2025, the US stockmarket remains dominated by investment in AI.  Such dominance, based almost exclusively on building one kind of AI - Large Language Models is sustaining fears of an AI bubble.  "We are long, long away from that," Jensen Huang, CEO of AI chip-maker Nvidia and the world’s first $5trn company, told Sky News last month.

content.title: Fears grow of AI bubble - and here are the pressure points that could burst it
content.summary: While the value of some companies integral to the AI boom like Nvidia, Oracle and Coreweave have seen their value fall since the highs of the mid-2025, the US stockmarket remains dominated by investment in AI.  Such dominance, based almost exclusively on building one kind of AI - Large Language Models is sustaining fears of an AI bubble.  "We are long, long away from that," Jensen Huang, CEO of AI chip-maker Nvidia and the world’s first $5trn company, told Sky News last month.

headline: Advisors Target Diversification in 2026 Strategies as Mag 7 Risk Rises
summary: The Magnificent Seven, including Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Meta, Microsoft, Nvidia and Tesla, now comprise one-third of that index’s market value.  After all the hand-holding, however, advisors should remind clients why diversification matters to their financial plans, said Patrick Runyen, director of organic growth at Modera Wealth Investing.  READ ALSO: Schwab Scraps its Premium Robo Advisor Platform and Are Model Portfolios Key to Alt Adoption?

content.title: Advisors Target Diversification in 2026 Strategies as Mag 7 Risk Rises
content.summary: The Magnificent Seven, including Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Meta, Microsoft, Nvidia and Tesla, now comprise one-third of that index’s market value.
